series_description: This series documents the agency's financial affairs with a banking institution relating to payroll.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy in accordance with No. 8 on the schedule cover page.

series_title: Bank Records - All Other Bank Records
series_description: This series documents the agency's financial dealings with a banking institution that are non-payroll related.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the receipt by the bank of agency deposits to its accounts.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy.

series_title: Checks and Checking This series contains reports, cancelled checks, returned checks, check registers, checking statements, and other records relating to the agency's checking accounts.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy.

series_title: Commonwealth Accounting and Reporting System Reports – CARS This series contains reports prepared by the Department of Accounts for the agency relating to the CARS system.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy.

series_title: Payroll Records, CIPPS - All Other Records Not Listed in GS 102
retention_statement: Retain 5 years or until audited, whichever is longer, then destroy.

series_title: Purchasing – Bid and Bid Proposal Files
series_description: This series documents the contracts that are awarded to various vendors for goods and services used by the agency. The series consists of the bid proposals, requests for proposals, worksheets, correspondence and memorandums.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after award to successful bidder, closure, cancellation, or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy.

series_title: Purchasing – Contracts and Agreements/Blanket Purchase Orders This series is used to procure goods/services which are authorized for purchase by an active, open contract.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after completion and/or termination of contract or agreement, or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy.

series_title: Purchasing – Purchase Orders This series is used to procure goods/services which are not covered under a contract/agreement.
retention_statement: Retain for 5 years or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy.

series_title: Purchasing – Requisitions This series is used to initiate the purchase/procurement of goods and services for the agency.
retention_statement: Retain for 5 years or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the receipt of goods/services which have been purchased by the agency.
retention_statement: Retain for 5 years or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents and authorizes the payment or transfer of funds from the agency's accounts.
retention_statement: Retain for 5 years or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy.

series_title: Vouchers – Duplicate or Reference Copies This series is used to reference the payment or transfer of funds from the agency's accounts. The originals are located in the Agency Accounting Office Files.

Buildings: Access Control Records This series controls access to specific buildings, departments, rooms or areas. This series may include access lists, sign-in sheets, logs, registers, instruction books or emergency contact records. Includes both paper and electronic records.
retention_statement: Retain 3 year after last entry or use, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: Documents created solely to test computer, system or
retention_statement: Retain for 1 year, then delete or destroy.
